column4: I compiled my own 3.1.5 kernel for 11.04, and everything seems work great except I can't pair anything over bluetooth.  Is there a common fix for this?  google hasn't found me anything solid on it
if you've built your own kernel, that's pretty muich your issue to work through and resolve
checking lib-bluez compatability against your kernel version and the bluetooth device against your kernel version is the way to start though
